==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|げん|り|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{compound|ja|原|理|tr1=gen|tr2=ri|t1=principle|t2=theory}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|げんり}}

# A fundamental [[truth]] that bases on.
# An eternal [[law]] that is common over lots of fact.
# {{lb|ja|philosophy|sort=けんり'}} A basic [[fact]] which explains why something exist.
# {{lb|ja|physics|sort=けんり'}} A basic scientific [[law]] which explains how a thing works, especially, that is quite primitive and have been found at very long ago; a [[principle]].
#: {{ja-usex|アルキメデスの'''原理'''|アルキメデス の '''げんり'''|Archimedes' '''principle'''}}

====Usage notes====
* {{sense|physics}} [[law|Law]] is often used as a translation word for {{ja-r|法則|ほうそく}}, and [[effect]] for {{ja-r|効果|こうか}}.

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|a fundamental truth}} {{ja-r|真理|しんり}}
* {{sense|an eternal law}} {{ja-r|法則|ほうそく}}
* {{sense|philosophy}} {{ja-r|本質|ほんしつ}}

====Coordinate terms====
* {{sense|physics}} {{ja-r|法則|ほうそく}}, {{ja-r|効果|こうか}}
